page.title: 04A Day in the Life ...
page.content: At about 7.30 I got up and dressed and then went down for breakfast. I watched the{television}for a bit and at nine o'clock I called up my friend on my{walkie-talkie}as planned and he came round 5 minutes later. Then we went{skateboarding}down to the seafront with my{ghetto-blaster}to see my friend's new 16ft boat. Afterwards we went to get a drink and say hello. We played in the garden for a while. Then we went to the chippie at 1.30 for a{savaloy and chips.}After that we went to a cafe for a can of{shandy.} Afterwards we went home to my house to get my{radio controlled car}which we drove in the road outside my house and we made a scramble course. At 5.30 I went home for tea and put my nicad on charge for the night. I called up my friend again and watched{television} till 9.30 when I went to bed.
